import Mathlib

open Nat Topology Filter

/--
Let $f(x)=a_1\sin x+a_2\sin 2x+\dots+a_n\sin nx$, where $a_1,a_2,\dots,a_n$ are real numbers and where $n$ is a positive integer. Given that $|f(x)| \leq |\sin x|$ for all real $x$, prove that $|a_1|+|2a_2|+\dots+|na_n| \leq 1$.
-/
theorem putnam_1967_a1
(n : ℕ) (hn : n > 0)
(a : Set.Icc 1 n → ℝ)
(f : ℝ → ℝ)
(hf : f = (fun x : ℝ => ∑ i : Set.Icc 1 n, a i * Real.sin (i * x)))
(flesin : ∀ x : ℝ, abs (f x) ≤ abs (Real.sin x))
: abs (∑ i : Set.Icc 1 n, i * a i) ≤ 1 :=

```lean4
theorem putnam_1967_a1
(n : ℕ) (hn : n > 0)
(a : Set.Icc 1 n → ℝ)
(f : ℝ → ℝ)
(hf : f = (fun x : ℝ => ∑ i : Set.Icc 1 n, a i * Real.sin (i * x)))
(flesin : ∀ x : ℝ, abs (f x) ≤ abs (Real.sin x))
: abs (∑ i : Set.Icc 1 n, i * a i) ≤ 1 := by
  have h1 := flesin 0
  have h2 := flesin (Real.pi / 2)
  have h3 := flesin (Real.pi)
  have h4 := flesin (Real.pi / 2 + Real.pi)
  simp [hf, abs_le] at h1 h2 h3 h4
  norm_num at h1 h2 h3 h4
  cases' n with n
  all_goals simp_all [Finset.sum_Icc_succ_top, Nat.div_eq_of_lt, Nat.mod_eq_of_lt]
  all_goals
    nlinarith [Real.pi_pos]
```

-/
theorem putnam_1967_a1
(n : ℕ) (hn : n > 0)
(a : Set.Icc 1 n → ℝ)
(f : ℝ → ℝ)
(hf : f = (fun x : ℝ => ∑ i : Set.Icc 1 n, a i * Real.sin (i * x)))
(flesin : ∀ x : ℝ, abs (f x) ≤ abs (Real.sin x))
: abs (∑ i : Set.Icc 1 n, i * a i) ≤ 1 :=

```lean4
theorem putnam_1967_a1
(n : ℕ) (hn : n > 0)
(a : Set.Icc 1 n → ℝ)
(f : ℝ → ℝ)
(hf : f = (fun x : ℝ => ∑ i : Set.Icc 1 n, a i * Real.sin (i * x)))
(flesin : ∀ x : ℝ, abs (f x) ≤ abs (Real.sin x))
: abs (∑ i : Set.Icc 1 n, i * a i) ≤ 1 := by
  have h₁ := flesin 0
  have h₂ := flesin (Real.pi / 2)
  have h₃ := flesin (Real.pi)
  have h₄ := flesin (Real.pi / 2 + Real.pi)
  simp [hf, Real.sin_zero, Real.sin_pi, Real.sin_add, Real.sin_pi_div_two, Real.cos_pi_div_two,
    abs_le] at h₁ h₂ h₃ h₄
  norm_num at h₁ h₂ h₃ h₄
  cases' abs_cases (∑ i : Set.Icc 1 n, i * a i) with h₅ h₅ <;>
    cases' abs_cases (Real.sin (Real.pi / 2)) with h₆ h₆ <;>
    cases' abs_cases (Real.sin Real.pi) with h₇ h₇ <;>
    cases' abs_cases (Real.sin (Real.pi / 2 + Real.pi)) with h₈ h₈ <;>
    simp_all [abs_of_nonneg, abs_of_nonpos, Real.sin_pi_div_two, Real.sin_pi_sub, Real.sin_add,
      Real.sin_pi_div_two, Real.cos_pi_div_two]
  <;> linarith
```

(a : Set.Icc 1 n → ℝ)

theorem putnam_1967_a1
(n : ℕ) (hn : n > 0)
(a : Set.Icc 1 n → ℝ)
(f : ℝ → ℝ)
(hf : f = (fun x : ℝ => ∑ i : Set.Icc 1 n, a i * Real.sin (i * x)))
(flesin : ∀ x : ℝ, abs (f x) ≤ abs (Real.sin x))

(n : ℕ) (hn : n > 0)
(a : Set.Icc 1 n → ℝ)
(f : ℝ → ℝ)
(hf : f = (fun x : ℝ => ∑ i : Set.Icc 1 n, a i * Real.sin (i * x)))
(flesin : ∀ x : ℝ, abs (f x) ≤ abs (Real.sin x))

  simp [hf, Real.sin_pi_div_two, abs_nonneg] at h2
  have h3 := flesin (Real.pi)
  simp [hf, Real.sin_pi, abs_nonneg] at h3
  have h4 := flesin (Real.pi / 2 + Real.pi)
  simp [hf, Real.sin_add, Real.sin_pi_div_two, Real.cos_pi, abs_nonneg] at h4
  simp_all [abs_le, le_refl, abs_nonneg, le_of_lt]
